content:
Anyone using bitnami Docker images in their homelab or for self-hosting service.
Broadcom is renaming all current images and discontinuing a lot of the images
https://github.com/bitnami/charts/issues/35164

the bitnami images were briefly useful during the early ARM days, but most major projects now either publish their own multi-arch images anyway, or aren't difficult to compile
it'll be frustrating for anyone depending on the bitnami images, of course :hugging:
Damn. Bitnami images used to be my default when I had started my selfhosting journey. Sad to see its demise.
